projects.name: Land-Mine Detector
projects.description: Developed an automatic landmine detector bot that detects the landmine in the ground. It mark the landmines on the ground with the help of spray paint. This bot is used by soldiers for detecting landmines on the war land.

projects.name: Two Wheel Self Balance Bot
projects.description: Developed a two wheel self balancing robot, which is able to move on two wheels without falling. It can mimic human balance and stability.

projects.name: B-Fit Fitness Band
projects.description: Designed and developed a mobile application called B-Fit that offers a platform for health tracking and preventing deaths due to CVDs. Architected sensor integration for heart rate and activity levels. Implemented data analysis algorithms for accurate health metric collection. Established a notification system for abnormal health readings.

experiences.description: Developed a Robowar bot by integrating motor, battery and drivers with a arduino. Created the program for arduino to control different components of the Robowar bot. Sync a RC control system to the bot to control the Robowar bot.

Assisted in development of automation system for a local industry using Mycropython, Protius and Cloud. Worked with AWS cloud to store the data of the different sensors. Collaborated with team members using version control systems such as Discord to organize modifications and assign tasks.
experiences.location: Open Source Community of KIET Group of Institutions

full_output.name: Rohit Baghel
achievements_and_awards: I have participated in Technoxian World Cup organised by IIT Delhi in Robowar Category. And got the Participation Certificate.
I have participated in Innotech competition which is organised in my college. In which Me and my team members made a LandMine detector. And i got the Certificate for that.
I have participated in ABU Robocon competition which is organised by IIT Delhi. In which Me and my team members designed the bots. And cleared the fisrt stage. And selected for the second stage.
